text: yapanaya, mulathiw, kilinochchi aadi pradeshawala sita masa kihipayak thisse wana sathungen piri yala abhaya bhumiya haraha pa gamanin paminena dahas sankhyatha bathimathuntath katharagama wandanawe paminena laksha sankhyatha bathimathuntath awashya aaharapana labadima parithyagashilinge wagakima saha yuthukama we.me bawa manawa awabodha karagath ruhunu katharagama maha dewalaye basnayaka nilame, uuwa palath pradhana amathya, shashindra rajapaksha mahatha wisin katharagama maha dewalaya idiripita mema dina pahalowa pura ma maha bath dansalak labademin katayuthu karana athara ethumage purna aashirwadaya matha paliyagoda wikramarathna samuha wyaparaye kalamanakara adhyaksha madhura wikramarathna mahatha wisin katharagama sithulpawwa pare bodhirajapura wiharasthanaya idiripita thawath suwisheshi maha bath dansalak pawathwima wisheshayen sandahan kala yuthuya.wikramarathna samuha aayathanaya poson samaye anuradhapurayata paminena laksha sankhyatha bathimathunta udasana saha dahawal maha bath dansalak pawathwana athara ema sath kriyawa katharagama asala perahara pawathwena dina pahalowa purama bathimathun wenuwen pawathwima itha agaya kala yuthuya.mema dana shalawa da samagiye madhyasthanayaki.

nimal wijesinha anuradhapura athireka disthrik samuha2600 shri sambuddhathwa jayanthi pinkam malawe wesak poyata samagamiwa mayi 14 da janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage pradhanathwayen anuradhapura puja nagarayedi jathika wesak uthsawaya pawathwimata adala sanwidhana katayuthu me dinawala kadinamin sidu kere.14 da paswaru 4.00 ta anuradhapura shri maha bo samindu parishraye sannipatha shalawedi ulela pawathwimata niyamithaya.aagamika katayuthu amathyanshaya, agramathya karyalaya, bauddha katayuthu departhamenthuwa, uthuru mada palath sabhawa ha ekwa jathika wesak uthsawaya sanwidhanaya karayi.2600 shri sambuddhathwa jayanthiya aagamika mahothsawa meheyum kamituwe sabhapathi anuradhapura shri sambuddha jayanthi wiharadhipathi pujya nugethanne panynyananda nahimipano uthsawa katayuthu sambandhayen karunu dakwamin sambuddhathwa jayanthi mahothsawayata samagamiwa anuradhapurayedi sambuddhathwa jayanthi mawatha nam kirima da sambuddhathwa jayanthi smarakaya nirawaranaya kirima da sambuddhathwa jayanthi watarawuma wiwrutha kirima ha samaru muddaraya nikuth kirima ulele pradhana anga kipayak bawa sandahan kalaha.

hanwalla rajasinha madi maha widuhala saha sithawaka madi maha widuhal athara me tharaga pawathwe.pura wasara gananak mululle sithawaka madi maha widuhalata amila sewayak itukala kirthimath widuhalpathiwarayeku wu es. em. munasinha mahathata upahara pinisa es. em. munasinha anusmarana abhiyogatha kusalanaya wenuwen me tharagaya pawathwe.sithawaka madi maha widuhale aadi shishya sangamaya saha pasale sanwardhana samithiya magin me tharagaya sanwidhanaya karanu labayi.wasara thunak thisse itha janapriyawa pawathwena me krikat tharagaya 2007 warshayedi mulwarata pawath wu athara, ema warshaye di sithawaka madi maha widuhala athiwishishta jayak athpath kara gaththeya.2008 warshaye di tharagaya pawathwimata sanwidhana katayuthu sidu kala da rate pawathi ayahapath wathawaranaya nisa eya nopawathwuna athara 2009 warshaye di nawatha uthkarshawath andamin eya pawathwini.

ee athare kol ekak dunna 1919 ta kochchiye welawa ahaganna.kiwwa welawa 17:27 da koheda.ethenta gihin ahuwahama 18:17 [eekath slo ekak.welawata gallatama yanawa] monawa karannada tikat gaththa.aragena apata gamana giyata hambuna ru.2500kama kanna thiranaya kala.kadekata gihilla kamayi,mayilo pakatuyi gaththa.dan welawath hari kochchiyata.bima botha genna gihipu 3 denek na.yantham kol dila dila genna gaththa.stesamata giya witharayi.kochchiya aawa.tikat aragena thibuna nisa hondayi.taggala nagagaththa.
